title: How to Get Better at Goldeneye 007

steps.headline: Get used to the controls in the game.
steps.description: Know when and how to shoot and how to move like a spy.

steps.headline: Beat the game on the "Agent" difficulty.
steps.description: This is recommended if you JUST played this game and are a rookie. If you think you are up for the challenge on the higher difficulties, then go for it!

steps.headline: Work your way up in single player difficulties.
steps.description: When playing the missions, go to a harder difficulty setting such as Secret Agent and 00 Agent. This will require more objectives, less ammunition, better accuracy for enemies, and fewer hits before you die!

steps.headline: Play multiplayer.
steps.description: Play against someone or with a group of people who are better than you.

steps.headline: If you unlocked the bonus levels: Aztec and Egyptian, that means you are improving and are getting really good!
If you unlocked 007 mode, that means you are a master at the game.
steps.description: You can then edit the games variables. Such as enemy health, damage, accuracy and reaction.

steps.headline: A step that is often missed while playing the game: Throw remote mines on the walls while sprinting.
steps.description: but keep your distance because Bond could die easily in the explosion. A good level to do this is on the Facility level.

text: Get used to the controls in the game. Know when and how to shoot and how to move like a spy. Beat the game on the "Agent" difficulty. This is recommended if you JUST played this game and are a rookie. If you think you are up for the challenge on the higher difficulties, then go for it! Work your way up in single player difficulties. When playing the missions, go to a harder difficulty setting such as Secret Agent and 00 Agent. This will require more objectives, less ammunition, better accuracy for enemies, and fewer hits before you die! Play multiplayer. Play against someone or with a group of people who are better than you. If you unlocked the bonus levels: Aztec and Egyptian, that means you are improving and are getting really good!  If you unlocked 007 mode, that means you are a master at the game. You can then edit the games variables. Such as enemy health, damage, accuracy and reaction. A step that is often missed while playing the game: Throw remote mines on the walls while sprinting. but keep your distance because Bond could die easily in the explosion. A good level to do this is on the Facility level. Just keep playing! Remember: Practice makes Perfect.
